tests.name: tags, for, continue with changing loop var
tests.template: {% for foo in array limit: 3 %}{{ foo }} {% endfor %}{% for bar in array offset: continue %}{{ bar }} {% endfor %}

tests.name: tags, for, nothing to continue from
tests.template: {% for item in array %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in array offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 a3 a4 a5 a6

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue without preceding loop
tests.template: {% for item in array offset: continue %}{{ item }} {% endfor %}

tests.name: tags, for, continue from a limit that is greater than length
tests.template: {% for item in array limit: 99 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in array offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 a3 a4 a5 a6

tests.name: tags, for, continue from a range expression
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 3 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 a3 b4 b5 b6

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue twice with limit
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 2 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) limit: 2 offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}c{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 b3 b4 c5 c6

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue twice with changing limit
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 2 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) limit: 3 offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}c{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 b3 b4 b5 c6

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue twice with no second limit
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 2 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}c{{ item }} {% endfor %}
tests.result: a1 a2 b3 b4 b5 b6

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue from a broken loop
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 4 %}{% if item == 3 %}{% break %}{% endif %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}

tests.name: tags, for, offset continue from a broken loop with preceding limit
tests.template: {% for item in (1..6) limit: 3 %}a{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) %}{% if item == 3 %}{% break %}{% endif %}b{{ item }} {% endfor %}{% for item in (1..6) offset: continue %}c{{ item }} {% endfor %}

tags, liquid, reference test #2
tests.template:
{%- liquid
  for value in array
    echo value
    unless forloop.last
      echo '#'
    endunless
  endfor
-%}

tests.name: tags, liquid, reference test #3
tests.template:
{%- liquid
  for value in array
    assign double_value = value | times: 2
    echo double_value | times: 2
    unless forloop.last
      echo '#'
    endunless
  endfor

  echo '#'
  echo double_value
-%}
